content.html:
If you're a sw engineer: today could hardly get more interesting. Shutting down microservices in bulk is next up today. Now we know why the Git freeze was instituted a few hours earlier. As said before, this is the kind of stuff that we've not seen in public, at this scale.
twitter.com/elonmusk/statu…
content.value:
If you're a sw engineer: today could hardly get more interesting.

Shutting down microservices in bulk is next up today. Now we know why the Git freeze was instituted a few hours earlier.

As said before, this is the kind of stuff that we've not seen in public, at this scale.
